```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
```

# Main Document 

```{r}
child_document <- "template_general_qc.Rmd" # the child doc will be the general qc Rmd

grandchild_document_names <- c("cmqt_anthropometry_qc", "cmqt_lipids_qc", "cmqt_blood_pressure_qc", "cmqt_hematology_qc")

```

```{r, results='asis'}
# Call child document for general QC check 
# This chunk will loop through the list of table names to be QC'd 

res <- vector(mode = "list", length = length(grandchild_document_names))

for (i in 1:length(grandchild_document_names)) {
  grandchild_document_name <- grandchild_document_names[i]
  res[[i]] <- knitr::knit_child(child_document, quiet = TRUE, envir = environment())
}

cat(unlist(res), sep = '\n')
```
